GET YOUR OWN NYFW SKETCH

Complimentary Fashion Sketches Courtesy of Triumph Hotels

This Fashion Week, while the runways are showing the next season’s latest, we at Triumph Hotels know the real fashion happens on the street. In partnership with fashion illustrator and Instagram sensation @hnicholsillustration (Holly Nichols), we're offering complimentary fashion sketches for guests and locals alike to capture their best NYFW street-style look complete with an iconic NYC backdrop.

Sketch sessions are available by appointment only at the following locations. Sign up to secure your spot on the NYFW 2017 tab of the Triumph Hotels’ Facebook page: Facebook.com/TriumphHotels

Hotel Chandler
Monday, February 13 
5:00 p.m. – 7:00 p.m.
12 East 31st Street, New York, NY

Hotel Belleclaire
Tuesday, February 14 
5:00 p.m. – 7:00 p.m.
250 West 77th Street, New York, NY

Hotel Edison
Wednesday, February 15  
5:00 p.m. – 7:00 p.m.
228 West 47th Street, New York, NY

The Iroquois New York
Thursday, February 16  
5:00 p.m. – 7:00 p.m.
49 West 44th Street, New York, NY
